name: Uprising: Join or Die
description: Uprising offers more strategy than a military sim, and more action strategy than a shoot'em up. Using your hi-tech assault tank, loaded with powerful weapons, you need to establish tidal bases, mine for power, build factories and direct legions of allied units against the...

reviews.review_text: This game is one of my hidden gems. I can remeber getting a demo on PC Gamer around the same time that Battlezone was released, its just one of those demos that you just play over and over again even though youve completed everything on it. This was back when PC Gamer was GOD!

I love this game, mix of action FPS and strategy.  Its still enjoyable, especially if set to 1920x1080. You can do this via '%steam folder%\steamapps\common\Uprising Join or Die\nglide_config.exe'.         YouTubeâ„¢ Video:  Uprising: Join or Die - 15 minutes gameplay

I owned this game back in the day and loved it. However, it does not work on windows 10 professional. The splash screen with the title shows up but the game never starts. Steam offers no support and tells you, the buyer that you have to contact a third party vendor for support. There are posts about this issue but no resolution. Purchase at this risk of throwing your money away.
